trigger: Quantification of <extra_id_0> IL-17 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA by semiquantitative reverse transcription - polymerase chain reaction
PBMC were incubated with various concentrations of anti-CD3 in the presence or absence of inhibitors ( LY294002 , PDTC ) .
After 16 hours of incubation , mRNA was extracted with RNAzol B ( Biotex Laboratories , Houston , TX , USA ) in accordance with the manufacturer 's instructions .
Reverse transcription of 2 mug of total mRNA was performed at 42degreesC using the Superscripttrade reverse transcription system ( Takara , Shiga , Japan ) .

PCR amplification of cDNA aliquots was performed by adding 2.5 mM dNTPs , 2.5 U of <extra_id_0> Taq <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> DNA polymerase ( Takara ) and 0.25 muM of sense and antisense primers .
The reaction was performed in PCR buffer ( 1.5 mM MgCl2 , 50 mM KCl , 10 mM Tris-HCl , pH 8.3 ) in a total volume of 25 mul .

The following sense and antisense primers for each molecules were used : <extra_id_0> IL-17 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> sense , 5'-ATG ACT CCT GGG AAG ACC TCA TTG-3 ' ; IL-17 antisense , 5'-TTA GGC CAC ATG GTG GAC AAT CGG-3 ' ; <extra_id_0> glyceraldehyde-3-phosphate dehydrogenase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> GAPDH <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) sense , 5'-CGA TGC TGG GCG TGA GTA C-3 ' ; <extra_id_0> GAPDH <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> antisense , 5'-CGT TCA GCT CAG GGA TGA CC-3 ' .

Reactions were processed in a DNA thermal cycler ( Perkin-Elmer Cetus , Norwalk , CT , USA ) through cycles for 30 s of denaturation at 94degreesC , 1 min of annealing at 56degreesC for <extra_id_0> GAPDH <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IL-17 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , followed by 1 min of elongation at 72degreesC .

PCR rounds were repeated for 25 cycles each for both <extra_id_0> GAPDH <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IL-17 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ; this was determined as falling within the exponential phase of amplification for each molecule .
The level of mRNA expression was presented as a ratio of <extra_id_0> IL-17 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> PCR product over <extra_id_0> GAPDH <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> product .
